name: EventOpenContainer
description: This event is fired when a container/inventory is opened.
overview:
Fires when a container/inventory interface is opened.

Behavior:
- The `inventory` field provides access to the container contents
- The `screen` field provides access to the screen interface
- This event is cancellable - preventing the container from opening
- Useful for custom container handling or automated sorting

Fields:
- inventory (Inventory): The inventory helper object. This provides access to all slots in the container, allowing you to examine items, count contents, or perform inventory operations.
- screen (IScreen): The screen helper object. This provides access to screen properties like title, class name, and other UI elements. You can use this to determine what type of container was opened.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
